game

Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Creature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Character, Monster

    public abstract class Creature
extends java.lang.Object
    Creature is the superclass of Monster and Character
    Author:
    heleneyj, magnubau, williad

                int xPos,

                java.lang.String imageUrl,
                java.util.ArrayList weapons)
        A constructor for the class Creature
        Parameters:
        playerId - id of the player
        creatureId - id of the creature
        creatureName - name of the creature
        hp - health points
        ac - armor class
        movement - movement range
        damageBonus - damage bonus
        attackBonus - attack bonus
        backstory - backstory
        xPos - x-coordinate
        yPos - y-coordinate
        imageUrl - image url
        weapons - ArrayList of weapons

    • Method Detail

      • attackCreature

        public boolean attackCreature(Creature target,
                              int weaponIndex)
        Attacks a target-creature with the specified weapon
        Parameters:
        target - Creature to attack
        weaponIndex - weapon to be used
        Returns:
        true if hit success, false otherwise

      • hit

        public int hit()
        Rolls 20 sided die to, adds attack bonus of the Creature to the dies value.
        Returns:
        The value of the die ? attack bonus.

      • hitSuccess

        public boolean hitSuccess(int hit,
                          Creature target)
        Checks if the Creatures hit is higher than another Creatures armour class.
        Parameters:
        hit - hit.
        target - A Creature.
        Returns:
        true if hit greater than or equal to target.getAc(), false otherwise.

      • moveCreature

        public boolean moveCreature(int newX,
                            int newY,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Creature> creatures)
        Moves the Creature to a new position. Makes sure the Creature do not move on top of another Creature, and that it doeas not move outside of its movement range.
        Parameters:
        newX - new x-position.
        newY - new y-position.
        creatures - ArrayList of all creatures in game.
        Returns:
        true if the Creature moved to a valid location, false otherwise.
